Tribesmen Motorcycle Club and King Cobras biker convoy sends plumes of smoke across Auckland CBD https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tribesmen-motorcycle-club-and-king-cobras-biker-convoy-sends-plumes-of-smoke-across-auckland-cbd/6EK4HFA2QNAGPJAERBGPLZLKME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tribesmen-motorcycle-club-and-king-cobras-biker-convoy-sends-plumes-of-smoke-across-auckland-cbd/6EK4HFA2QNAGPJAERBGPLZLKME/ Police said they would make follow-up inquiries regarding the incident 'if able'. Sun, 05 May 2024 07:41:44 +0000 Plumes of smoke were sent across Central Auckland after a King Cobras gang member performed burnouts during a memorial event. Photo / Reddit / VeNoMouSNZ
First suspected case of cow-to-human bird flu transfer means NZ must be prepared - epidemiologist https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/first-suspected-case-of-cow-to- human-bird-flu-transfer-means-nz-must-be-prepared-epidemiological/P3AALJMNDVDYHOQHQXP7AQO3QU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/first-suspected-case-of-cow-to- human-bird-flu-transfer-means-nz-must-be-prepared-epidemiological/P3AALJMNDVDYHOQHQXP7AQO3QU/ Jamie MortonThe risk to humans is still low, but NZ needs plan for 'range of scenarios', expert says. Sun, 05 May 2024 04:26:42 +0000 Scientists have been growing increasingly concerned by the spread and evolution of H5N1 avian flu, which has killed tens of millions of poultry birds in four years and been detected in two dozen countries. Photo / 123rf
Tasman couple lose rates fight after judge rejects counterclaim built on ‘potpourri of legal concepts’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tasman- Couple-lose-rates-fight-after-judge-rejects-counterclaim-built-on-potpourri-of-legal-concepts/PRBLB6H2CJCUJPZ3R7D3ACBUWE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tasman- Couple-lose-rates-fight-after-judge-rejects-counterclaim-built-on-potpourri-of-legal-concepts/PRBLB6H2CJCUJPZ3R7D3ACBUWE/ Tracy Neal'It doesn’t make sense and it doesn’t constitute a defence:' Judge Tony Zohrab. Sun, 05 May 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Retired berry growers Ray and Philippa Hellyer from the Moutere, near Motueka, were sued by the Tasman District Council for failing to pay rates, which they said they withheld until they got the answers they were seeking.
Northland missing fishermen: Pair named as Sarath Kumar and Ferzil Babu amid ongoing search https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-missing-fishermen-pair-named-as-sarath-kumar-and-ferzil-babu-amid-ongoing-search/LRWMJIHPRJB55DHUBGMHZNOBGE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-missing-fishermen-pair-named-as-sarath-kumar-and-ferzil-babu-amid-ongoing-search/LRWMJIHPRJB55DHUBGMHZNOBGE/ Brodie StoneThe body of one victim was located on Friday, while the search continues for his friend. Lawyer’s comments to Family Court judge earn him suspension https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyers-comments-to-family-court-judge-earn-him-suspension/IXCJBBQ4B5HOXAJJQKR5GKTFSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyers-comments-to-family-court-judge-earn-him-suspension/IXCJBBQ4B5HOXAJJQKR5GKTFSU/ Jeremy WilkinsonHe claimed a judge was sexist and labelled the court a "vagina court". Sun, 05 May 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The lawyer became frustrated with the Family Court process and accused the judge, court staff and opposing counsel of bias and sexism. Photo / 123rf
Baby breast milk bank needs donors for Northland’s most vulnerable https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/baby-breast-milk-bank-crying-out-for-support-for-northlands-most-vulnerable/Z3VHP7NN6JCRZA5R4LYAIKDJJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/baby-breast-milk-bank-crying-out-for-support-for-northlands-most-vulnerable/Z3VHP7NN6JCRZA5R4LYAIKDJJQ/ Denise PiperThe human milk bank still needs $12,000 to get up and running.
